section.title:
count tags creating by item
physical inventory creating count tags Create Count Tag by Item
section.para: Count Tags are used to spearhead Inventory counts. They are created manually and on-demand, and they are not tied to any particular cycle or frequency, as Cycle Count Tags are. To create a Count Tag by Item, select the "Create Count Tag by Item" option. The following screen will appear:
When creating Count Tags by Item, you are presented with the following options:

tip.para: By default, the system allows only one unposted Count Tag per Item Site. To view all unposted Count Tags in your system, see the Count Tag Edit List.

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the Item you want to create a Count Tag for.
Specify the Warehouse you want the Count Tag created for.
This field will remain blank until you enter an Item Number into the "Item Number" field. Once that is entered, the Warehouse(s) where the Item is located will display in the list.

varlistentry.term: Mark Created Count Tag as Priority

listitem.para: Select to give priority status to Count Tag.

Count Tags marked as having priority status are listed first in any prioritized lists. For example, priority Count Tags will appear at the top of the Count Tag Edit List; whereas, non-priority Count Tags will appear at the bottom of the list.

varlistentry.term:
freezing of inventory
inventory freezing at count tag creation Freeze Inventory

listitem.para: The Quantity on Hand value is not updated when a transaction is posted against a frozen Item Site. Instead, Inventory transactions are pooled and then posted later when the Item Site is unfrozen--or thawed. The Quantity on Hand is updated when the Item Site is thawed. For a detailed explanation of these concepts, see the Freezing and Thawing"Topic: Freezing and Thawing" section.

note.para: When an Item Site is frozen, any Warehouse activity entered against that Item Site--including Work Orders--will use the Quantity on Hand shown at the time of freezing.

listitem.para: Select if you want to create Count Tags for an individual Warehouse Location.

If selected, you will have the option to specify which Warehouse Location you want to have Count Tags created for. This option enables you to count individual Warehouse Locations separately, without having to post counts for an entire Warehouse all at once.

note.para: An Item must have Multiple Location Control (MLC) turned ON to take advantage of the Count Tags by Location feature. If the Item is not multiply-located, then this option will not be available.

listitem.para: This is a scrolling text field with word-wrapping for entering Comments related to the Count Tag. Use the Comments field to enter any instructions or other Comments that need to reach and be read by the Inventory counters.
